properties.description: Dataset for JSON response from REST API.
The Database containing the Control entities.
A dataset originating from Azure SQL DB.
A dataset originating from the Control DB.

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/_Process Type 1 - Azure SQL DB to Blob')]

properties.description:
Extract data from an Azure SQL DB into parquet files in Azure Blob Storage (ADLS Gen 2).

Use a For Each loop operating in parallel mode.

For debugging purposes, you can simulate 
 JSON array with:
 
[{"ProductNumber" : "HL-U509"},{"ProductNumber" : "FR-R92R-62"}]

activities.name: Filter out Invalid Entities
activities.description: If the EntityKey < 0, filter out.  An EntityKey of -1 is used to indicate there are no Entities to Process.

activities.name: Process Entities
activities.description: Process each individual Entity.

activities.name: Set Process Start Time
activities.description: Set the LastRunStartTime for this Entity

activities.name: If Extract Control Applies
activities.description: If the Variable ExtractControlQuery is not blank, execute this query to return a value for Extract Control.  This is used only in incremental/changeset type extracts.

value.value: @{activity('Translate JSON Variables').output.result.SourceSystem}.@{activity('Translate JSON Variables').output.result.EntityName} - Rows read: @{activity('Import Data').output.rowsRead} | Rows written: @{activity('Import Data').output.rowsCopied}

Error in Data Factory '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' | Pipeline '@{pipeline().Pipeline}' | Entity '@{activity('Translate JSON Variables').output.result.SourceSystem}.@{activity('Translate JSON Variables').output.result.EntityName}' | @{activity('Import Data').output.errors[0].Message}

activities.name: Translate JSON Variables
activities.description: Accept four parameters, VariablesJSON, OverrideVariablesJSON, ConfigurationJSON and DefaultsJSON and translate into a recordset where the columns are a representation of the nodes in the resultant JSON.

activities.name: If Incremental Set Next Extract Control

ifTrueActivities.name: Set Next Extract Control Value
ifTrueActivities.description: Update the ExtractControl for this Process Entity

properties.description:
Save the Current data into History folder and determine the Changeset (if applicable)

Use a For Each loop operating in parallel mode.

For debugging purposes, you can simulate 
 JSON array with:
 
[{"ProductNumber" : "HL-U509"},{"ProductNumber" : "FR-R92R-62"}]

activities.name: Process Entity
activities.description: Process each individual Entity.

activities.name: Process History and Changeset
activities.description: This Notebook will process each record and record History and, if required, determine the Changeset of this newly arriving data

activities.name: Set Process Start Time
activities.description: Set the LastRunStartTime for this Entity

activities.name: Translate JSON Variables
activities.description: Accept four parameters, VariablesJSON, OverrideVariablesJSON, ConfigurationJSON and DefaultsJSON and translate into a recordset where the columns are a representation of the nodes in the resultant JSON.

value.value: Success in Data Factory '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' | Pipeline '@{pipeline().Pipeline}' for '@{activity('Translate JSON Variables').output.result.SourceSystem}.@{activity('Translate JSON Variables').output.result.EntityName}' - Databricks Runsheet URL: @{activity('Process History and Changeset').output.runPageUrl} | Runtime (ms):  @{activity('Process History and Changeset').output.executionDuration}

Error in Data Factory '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' | Pipeline '@{pipeline().Pipeline}' for '@{activity('Translate JSON Variables').output.result.SourceSystem}.@{activity('Translate JSON Variables').output.result.EntityName}' - Databricks Runsheet URL: @{activity('Process History and Changeset').output.runPageUrl} | Runtime (ms):  @{activity('Process History and Changeset').output.executionDuration}

activities.name: Lookup the Data Date
activities.description: Read the Control table that specifies which date this data pertains to.

activities.description: If the EntityKey < 0, filter out.  An EntityKey of -1 is used to indicate there are no Entities to Process.

Extract data from an Json File into parquet files in Azure Blob Storage (ADLS Gen 2).

Use a For Each loop operating in parallel mode.

For debugging purposes, you can simulate 
 JSON array with:
 
[{"ProductNumber" : "HL-U509"},{"ProductNumber" : "FR-R92R-62"}]

activities.name: Filter out Invalid Entities
activities.description: If the EntityKey < 0, filter out.  An EntityKey of -1 is used to indicate there are no Entities to Process.

activities.name: Process Entities

Error in Data Factory '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' | Pipeline '@{pipeline().Pipeline}' | Entity '@{activity('Translate JSON Variables').output.result.SourceSystem}.@{activity('Translate JSON Variables').output.result.EntityName}' | @{activity('Import Data').output.errors[0].Message}
